summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of First Avenue Nortwest from North Sixtieth Street to West Fifty-eighth Street; Greenwood Avenue from North Fifty-seventh Street to North Sixtieth Street; West Fifty-eighth Street from First Avenue Northwest to the angle point between First Avenue Northwest and Third Avenue Northwest; North Fifty-eighth Street from Phinney Avenue to First Avenue Northwest; Palatine Avenue from North Fifty-eighth Street to Ballard Place; North Fifty-seventh Street from Phinney Avenue to Palatine Avenue; Ballard Place from Palatine Avenue to First Avenue Northwest; and North Fifty-ninth Street from Phinney Avenue to First Avenue Northwest, all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same and by constructing concrete side walks thereon in accordance with majority petition, being file \# \_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_\_ and providing for the payment therefor by the mode of "Payment by Bonds," as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle
